author: Jon Porter
title: One World: Together at Home could be Live Aid for the coronavirus generation
description: The WHO and international advocacy group Global Citizen have announced plans for a benefit concert on April 18th. One World: Together at Home features a lineup curated by Lady Gaga including Lizzo, Billie Eilish, and Elton John
content:
The star-studded event will stream on every major service
Photo by Theo Wargo/Getty Images for AT&T
In an attempt to support and celebrate healthcare workers fighting the COVID-19 pandemic, the World Health Organization and international advocacy group … [+3135 chars]
